LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_ColdFreeze.label: freeze snap
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_ColdFreeze.description: Endless freezing air swallowed the world in heavy snow, casting an icy hell overnight.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_ColdFreeze.endMessage: Ice will thaw eventually, and no matter what challenges nature presents, life will find its way.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_ColdFreeze.letterText: Air tempreture plunged all of a sudden, and a thick layer of cloud is looming above the horizon. A freeze snap is coming, almost like the reaper's frozen sickle hanging in the sky, ready for some fresh blood.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_ColdSnap.label: convective cold snap
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_ColdSnap.description: Cold wind brushes through the land, grey clouds blankets the sky. It nothing but pure desolation.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_ColdSnap.endMessage: The cold winds ceased, and warmth is filling the world once again.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_ColdSnap.letterText: The sky is turning dark. A strong low temperature air current is arriving.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_Drought.label: drought
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_Drought.description: Valuable water is evaporating into the dry air. Plants are dying out, so does everything else.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_Drought.endMessage: The drought has come to an end. It only takes a rain to turn this place into another cradle of life.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_Drought.letterText: Air temperature continued to rise, and no trace of moisture is found in the winds. The soil is gradually cracking. A drought is coming.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_HotRain.label: rain season
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_HotRain.description: The rain kept going on and on. Compounded with increasing temperature, the world is turning into a humid, suffocating prison.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_HotRain.endMessage: The heat wave has receded, and the rainstorm too. The rainy season has ended.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragon_HotRain.letterText: Hot air and water vapor accumulated above this patch of ground, a long, tedious rain season is about to arrive.
